column2:
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(abalone$Diameter+abalone$Length+abalone$Height, residuals(m1), ylab="Prediction Error (Shucked Wt)", xlab="Predictor Variables", main = "M1 Residuals vs. Predictors", pch=20, col="lightblue3")
plot(abalone$Diameter+abalone$Length+abalone$Height, residuals(m1)^2, ylab="Prediction Error (Shucked Wt) Sq", xlab="Predictor Variables", main = "M1 Residuals Sq vs. Predictors", pch=20, col="lightblue3")
hist(residuals(m1), breaks = 75,  xlab="Prediction Error (Shucked Wt)", main = "Histogram of M1 Residuals", pch=20, col="lightblue3")
qqnorm(residuals(m1),pch=20,col="lightblue3")
qqline(residuals(m1),pch=20,col="lightblue3")
plot(abalone$Diameter+abalone$Length+abalone$Height, residuals(m2),ylab="Prediction Error (Shucked Wt)", xlab="Predictor Variables", main = "M2 Residuals vs. Predictors", pch=20, col="lightblue3")

plot(abalone$Diameter+abalone$Length+abalone$Height, residuals(m2)^2,ylab="Prediction Error (Shucked Wt) Sq", xlab="Predictor Variables", main = "M2 Residuals Sq vs. Predictors", pch=20, col="lightblue3")
